SEARCH
Package simpledb

Interface Field

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
IntField, StringField
public interface Field extends Serializable
Interface for values of fields in tuples in SimpleDB.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      void serialize(DataOutputStream dos) throws IOException
      Write the bytes representing this field to the specified DataOutputStream.
      Parameters:
      dos - The DataOutputStream to write to.
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • DataOutputStream

    • compare

      boolean compare(Predicate.Op op, Field value)
      Compare the value of this field object to the passed in value. Example usage: foo.compare(op, value) is interpreted as "foo op value"
      Parameters:
      op - The operator
      value - The value to compare this Field to
      Returns:
      Whether or not the comparison yields true.

      Returns the type of this field (see Type.INT_TYPE or Type.STRING_TYPE
